channel.title: Help with npc's talking over their head?
channel.description:
umm i cant get my npcs to have words above their heads.. hwo do i do that?[shadow=red,left]HOW![/shadow]
help plox

item.title: Help with npc's talking over their head?
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

NPChandler.java

Search this :

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";[list]

Then this is how you make one talk:

[code] }
if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Hello, My name is bob, i like saying noob!”; [code/]

Something like that.
[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help with npc's talking over their head?

item.title: Help with npc's talking over their head?
item.dc:creator: @Xizl_Halton_Xizl Xizl_Halton_Xizl
item.description:
@Xizl_Halton_Xizl wrote:

Go into NPCHandler and press Ctrl+F Search for
‘textupdate =’ then put something you want it to say after the ‘=’

Read full topic
